content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Automation Science Pack Production Line at position(8.5, 13.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine-1 at position(8.5, 13.5)
- Iron gear input:
  - Wooden chest at position(7.5, 10.5) containing iron gears
  - Burner inserter at position(8.5, 10.5)
- Output system:
  - Burner inserter at position(10.5, 13.5)
  - Wooden chest at position(11.5, 13.5)
- Transport belt system starting at position(8.5, 11.5)

### Power Generation System around position(-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at position(-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Electric pole network connecting various positions

### Mining and Smelting Operations
Multiple mining and smelting setups at different locations:
1. Setup at position(41.0, -82.0):
   - Burner mining drill
   - Wooden chest at position(41.5, -80.5)
   - Burner inserter at position(41.5, -79.5)

2. Setup at position(-28.0, -61.0):
   - Burner mining drill
   - Wooden chest at position(-27.5, -59.5)
   - Burner inserter and stone furnace chain
   - Output chest at position(-22.5, -58.5)

3. Setup at position(-18.0, -53.0):
   - Burner mining drill
   - Wooden chest and inserter system
   - Stone furnace at position(-15.0, -51.0)
   - Output chest at position(-12.5, -50.5)

# ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Collision Errors
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones
- When placing entities next to reference positions, ensure proper spacing and direction
- Consider the tile dimensions of larger entities like assembling machines when placing nearby entities

### Power System Issues
- Keep boilers fueled to maintain consistent power supply
- Ensure proper connection of power poles to maintain electricity network

### Production Line Setup
- When building production lines, plan the layout considering the space needed for all components
- Verify input/output positions of inserters match with the intended source/target entities
- Consider the working area of assembling machines when placing related infrastructure

### Resource Management
- Keep mining drills fueled to maintain continuous operation
- Ensure proper fuel supply for burner inserters to maintain material flow
- Monitor input/output chest contents to maintain production flow
